name: Flappy Oppressor MK 2
description:
This game can run on both PC and Mobile with either a click, touch or even a console controller connected to a PC.

Enjoy this while you can. If the phone doesn't get in the way like always!!!  

This game may lag or stutter a bit. Tell me if it keeps happening non stop 

Side note: if the game is not responding then just tap or click on the screen
